Update: 2/2025
Five years later and I still haven't found a single kosher dairy fast food place that matches this one. Food is incredible and Yoeli always has a smile and good word for every customer.

No one has such good pizza as Table 40 and I have never had a bad tasting food item from here and I've tried things from their soups to their fish plates to their bakery items. Top notch.

Clean and bright place. Good and fast service. Great variety and excellent selection. Hot foods, cold foods, specialty drinks and bottled drinks. Some great delectable dessert options.
Effortless easy ordering and always scrumptious food!

Honestly the food is amazing. And i love the sauce they give with the colzones,
The only thing IDK why they are so stingy about that sauce, they only give 1, and whenever i ask them for another one they give me attitude. Calling the manager making a big deal. Then the manager is like "OK ill add Another sauce this time"
I mean i honestly DONT understand whats the big fuss about a sauce.

"I recently visited Table 40 Pizza Store and I have to say, I was blown away! The pizza was absolutely delicious - the crust was crispy and chewy at the same time, and the toppings were so fresh. The service was also fantastic - the staff were all friendly and welcoming, and they went above and beyond to ensure that my dining experience was enjoyable. Overall, I would highly recommend Table 40 Pizza Store to anyone looking for delicious pizza and great service. Can't wait to go back!" üçïüëå

Table 40 exceeded my expectations for our Hanukkah party! The food was not only impeccably presented but also a delightful culinary experience. Each dish showcased a perfect blend of flavors, catering to diverse palates. The attention to detail and freshness of ingredients stood out, leaving a lasting impression on our guests. Table 40's catering service is an absolute gem, making our celebration truly memorable.
I just had pizza and garlic knots there, it was so awesome. I love how it tastes and that it was ready so soon.
Very good food! very nice and fast service! amazing atmosphere!

Came in Saturday night, plenty of available seating. They have pizza, calzones, salads, sandwiches breakfast, cafe style foods.. Fast service. Got the pizza and french fries, pizza was well done and thin sliced, I liked that. They didn't have matzorela sticks so tried the cream cheese stick, wasn't as good.. overall good place and will be back for the good pizza üçï üòã

This dairy restaurant TABLE 40  is simply amazing! The food is incredibly delicious, and the service is friendly and attentive. I was blown away by the flavors and quality of the dishes. The staff made me feel welcome and went above and‚Ä¶

This place is super close to where I work so I order here pretty frequently. They are always fast, efficient, very very nice and accommodating, and the food is always spectacular! I mainly get the baked ziti with garlic knots, both taste‚Ä¶

Delicious pizza store, one of the best in Brooklyn. Nice quiet location and seating area, which is always clean, and you can almost always find an empty table. Pizza and all the rest of the food is fresh, piping hot, and absolutely delicious. Customer service is good, the employees are always looking for ways to assist the customers to the fullest extent. Located on 13th Ave. So parking will always be an issue, try walking there instead, it's definitely a better option than searching for parking in that neighborhood. Overall, it's really a spectacular place, would definitely recommend others to come visit and see for themselves this delicious kosher pizza shop.

Delicious..Full gourmet..Scrumptious..

it's the best place to go when you need a quite place to think and to eat delicious food at the same time. Service the best .
They have a full menu all the time Prices are accommodating for everyone.
Make a stop and you're gonna go out feeling good about the food you just spent money on.

I was pleasantly surprised.  The food was varied, fresh and tasty and the service was friendly and quick. I was happy to hear they deliver and that I could order online. I will definitely be doing so often.
5 stars is a understatement! Great service. Always with a smile. Great delicious food. I'd recommend everyone to try this place out and I guarantee you you'll love it!

The food is delicious, workers are friendly and courteous. And the food is always ready right away. I would recommend this store for a big or small group, the atmosphere is amazing!!!!

This is a good store with space to eat-in.
Often, however, there can be Israeli salad that is not fresh, an omelet that is a bit burnt and so on. With minor improvements in having consistently fresh and high quality food, this could be a great place.

Pizza shop with a nice selection of pizza, calzones, cheese sticks. I have not ordered from the salad bar but it looks fresh. Best part is the cinnamon buns, cheese muffins and the fast and friendly service.
It‚Äôs always the best time to visit there. When I‚Äôm hungry, or when I‚Äôm not. Delicious food. Costumer service is on top of the world. It just makes me happy when I think of this place.

the service is very quick, very courteous, however, the falafel balls servings were a bit small from what I expected,  as was the large fries, and a little bit pricey, but otherwise, the pizza is good and crunchy,  salads are a good size, and overall a pleasant experience
Good food cheap it's clean and tidy great service try it out

Pays a trip from anywhere!  Best Dairy restaurant.  Go try the praline drink with a hot cinnamon bun. While you are at it. Try their cheese blintzes and bubbies kreplach. Honestly can't go wrong with anything.  Huge fresh salad bar. For those that ya know... Amazing service every time.
